#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation
= URL format standard =

== Index ==
|| *Router address* || *Normal address* || ||
|| */index/* || */index/index.action* || index page of CDOJ ||

== Problem ==
|| *Router address* || *Normal address* || ||
|| */problem/list/* || */problem/list.action* || problem list, page 1 ||
|| */problem/list/{page}* || */problem/list.action?page={page}* || problem list, {page} defined the page to show ||
|| */problem/{id}/* || */problem/problem.action?id={id}* || show problem{id} ||
|| */problem/{id}/submit/* || */problem/problemSubmit.action?id={id}* || submit problem{id} ||
|| */problem/{id}/status/* || */problem/problemStatus.action?id={id}* || status of problem{id} ||
|| */problem/{id}/edit/* || */problem/problemEdit.action?id={id}* || admin page of problem{id} ||
